did.unittitle: Wilfrid Swancourt Bronson Archives

repository.corpname: Yale Peabody Museum of Natural History

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Wilfrid Swancourt Bronson Archives, Archives, Yale Peabody Museum

bioghist.head: Biographical Sketch
bioghist.p: Artist for Harry Payne Bingham. Accompanied marine expeditions as staff artics for the Bingham Oceanographic Collection.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Material
scopecontent.p: Watercolors of mostly fish and some marine invertebrates.

did.unittitle: Sketches and Paintings
Oil Paintings.
Oil painting, 15.5 x 19.5" (39 x 49.5 cm), 1926, Eastern Pacific. 3 Roosterfish, Nematistius pectoralis; 2 Sharks; few Yellowjacks, Gnathanodon speciosus.

Oil painting, 23.75 x 32.25" (60.5 x 83 cm), 1927. 2 Barberfish, Heniochus nigrirostris; 1 Yellowtail surgeonfish, Prionurus punctatus; 1 Rock croaker, Paraques viola; 1 Finespotted jawfish, Opistognathus punctatus.
Sketches.
Watercolor sketch, 8.5 x 11" (21 x 28 cm). Mutton hamlet, Epinephelus (Alphestes) afer; Panamic soldierfish, Myripristis leiognathos.
Watercolor sketch, 8.5 x 11" (21 x 28 cm). Spotted sand bass, Paralabrax maculatofasciatus; Sargassum blenny, Exerpes asper.
Watercolor sketch, 8.5 x 11" (21 x 28 cm). Barred serrano, Serranus fasciatus.
Watercolor sketch, 8.5 x 11" (21 x 28 cm). Leopard shark, Triakis semifasciata.
Watercolor sketch, 8.5 x 11" (21 x 28 cm). Mutton hamlet, Epinephelus (Alphestes) afer.
Watercolor sketch, 8.5 x 11" (21 x 28 cm). Gulf opaleye, Girella simplicidens.
Watercolor sketch, 8.5 x 11" (21 x 28 cm). Flapscale blenny, Paraclinus sini; Slow goby, Aruma histrio.
Watercolor sketch, 8.5 x 11" (21 x 28 cm). Cortez rainbow wrasse, Thalassoma lucasanum.
Watercolor Paintings.
Watercolor painting, 10 x 14" (25 x 35.5 cm). Green razorfish, Hemipteronotus splendens. BOC 267 and 396.
Watercolor painting, 10 x 14" (25 x 35.5 cm). Dwarf wrasses, Doratonotus megalepis. BOC 260, 261, 293, 262, 263, 264; Green razorfish, Hemipteronotus splendens. BOC 268, 269, 270, 271, 272, 273.
Watercolor painting, 10.5 x 15" (27 x 38 cm). Royal basslet, Lipogramma regia. BOC 526 (illus. of Bingham type specimen).
Watercolor painting, 14.75 x 10.5" (37.5 x 26.5 cm). Comb grouper, Mycteroperca rubra?; Neon gobies, Gobiosoma oceanops. BOC 371, 372.
Watercolor painting, 9 x 14" (22.5 x 35 cm). 3 Yellowhead wrasse, juvenile, Halichoeres garnoti?; 1 Slippery dick, Halichoeres bivittatus. BOC 252.
Watercolor painting, 9 x 14" (22.5 x 35 cm). Blackear wrasses, Halichoeres poeyi (H. kirshii). BOC 256, 257, 258, 259, 294.
Watercolor painting, 13.25 x 20" (33.5 x 50.5 cm. Spotted goatfish, Upeneus maculatus. BOC 146, 147; Yellow goatfish, Upeneus martinicus. BOC 148, 149.
Watercolor painting, 15 x 21.75" (37.5 x 55.5 cm). Gafftopsail pompanos, Trachinotus rhodopus; Scalloped hammerheads, Sphyrna lewini; Flag cabrilla, Epinephelus labriformis.
Watercolor painting, 21.5 x 14.25" (55 x 37 cm). Pink frogmouth, Chaunax pictus BOC 525.
Watercolor painting, 15 x 21.75" (38 x 55.5 cm). Snake eel, Myrichthys sp.; Giant hawkfish or Clownfish.
Watercolor painting, 14.75 x 21.75" (37.5 x 55 cm). Yellowtail snappers, Ocyurus chrysurus; Red snapper, Lutjanus campechanus BOC 552, 553.
Watercolor painting, 21.75 x 13" (55.5 x 33 cm). Blue angelfish, Holacanthus bermudensis; 3 Hogfishes, Lachnolaimus maximus.
Watercolor painting, 14.25 x 21" (36 x 53.5 cm). Indigo hamlets, Hypoplectrus unicolor; Red-spotted hawkfish, Amblycirrhitus pinos; Black hamlet, Hypoplectrus nigricans; Lantern bass, Serranus sp. ?.
Watercolor painting, 14.5 x 21" (37 x 54 cm). Black snappers, Apsilus dentatus. BOC 546, 547; Blackfin snapper, Lutjanus buccanella. BOC 550, 551, 387.
Watercolor painting, 14.5 x 21" (37 x 53.5 cm). Spanish hogfish, Bodianus rufus. BOC 249, 389; Puddingwife, Halichoeres radiatus. BOC 390?.

Watercolor painting, 13.5 x 18.25" (34.5 x 46.5 cm). 1. Bridle cardinalfish, Amia aurolineatum. BOC 461 type specimen; 2. and 8. Flamefish, Apogon maculatus. BOC 185-191; 3. Barred cardinalfish, Apogon binotatus. BOC 454-457; 4. Unidentifiable; 5., 6., 9. Belted cardinalfish, Amia (now Apogon) townsendi. BOC 460 type specimen; 7. Amia gloverensis. BOC 466 type specimen; 10., 11. Conchfish, Apogonichthys (now Astrapogon) stellatus. BOC 184.
Watercolor painting, 19? x 13.25" (49 x 33.5 cm). King angelfish, Holacanthus passer; Mexican hogfish, Bodianus diplotaenia.
Watercolor painting, 13? x 19?" (33.5 x 49.25 cm). Possibly ?Rock wrasse, Halichoeres semicinctus; Rock wrasse ?, Halichoeres semicinctus; Unidentified.
Watercolor painting, 13.25 x 20?" (33.5 x 52 cm). Deepreef scorpionfish, Scorpaenodes tredecimspinosus; Plumed scorpionfish, Scorpaena grandicornis.

Watercolor painting, 29.25 x 21" (74 x 53 cm), 1927. Sheepshead minnows, Cyprinodon variegatus, on bottom; Topminnow, Fundulus, in front of flamingo's leg; 2 Silversides, Atherina laticeps, at top; Flamingo.
Watercolor painting, 29.75 x 21.25" (29.75 x 54 cm), 1927. Flying fish, Exocoetidae; Dolphin fish, Coryphaena sp., probably hippurus; Preliminary sketch on reverse.
Watercolor painting, 19 x 26" (48 x 66 cm). Rainbow parrotfish, Scarus guacamaia, orig. Sparisoma; Striped parrotfish, Scarus croicensis; Redfin parrotfish, Sparisoma rubripinne.

Watercolor painting, 18 x 24" (45.5 x 60.5 cm), 1926. Shovelnose guitarfish, Rhinobatos productus; Wounded wrasse, Halichoeres chierchiae; Rock wrasse, Halichoeres semicinctus ?; Loosetooth parrotfish, Nicholsina denticulata.
Watercolor painting, 22 x 24.25" (55.5 x 62 cm), 1926. 4 California sheepshead; 1 Seabass or Grouper.
Watercolor painting, 12 x 20.25" (30 x 51.5 cm). 3 Gold-spotted snake eels, Myrichthys oculatus; 2 Sharptail eels, Myrichthys acuminatus.
Watercolor painting, 14.5 x 21" (37 x 53.5 cm). Reef squirrelfish, Sargocentron coruscus; Longjaw squirrelfish, Neoniphon marianus; Longspine squirrelfish, Holocentrus rufus.
Watercolor painting, 14.75 x 21.5" (37.5 x 54.5 cm). Queen angelfish, Holacanthus ciliaris (above); Rock beauty, Holacanthus tricolor (below).

Watercolor painting, 14.25 x 21" (36 x 54 cm), Caribbean. French angelfish, juvenile, Pomacanthus paru; Beaugregory, juvenile, Stegastes leucostictus; Dusky damselfish, juvenile, Stegastes dorsopunicans; Blue angelfish, juvenile, Holacanthus bermudensis; Rock beauty, juvenile, Holacanthus tricolor.
Watercolor painting, 14.25 x 21.5" (37 x 54.5 cm), 1925. 2 species of Grouper.

Watercolor painting, 21.25 x 29" (54 x 74 cm), 1928, "Running Before the Seine," Perlas Islands. 6 Filefish (green); 1 Wrasse (pink); 3 Cowfish (spotted); 3 Puffers (orange); school of Needlefish in net.
Watercolor painting, 11.75 x 20.25" (29.5 x 51.5 cm). School of Sardine-like fish; Shrimp.
Watercolor painting, 12 x 21.5" (31 x 55.5 cm). 2 Oyster toadfish.
Watercolor painting, 21 x 14" (53.5 x 35.5 cm), 1928, Fish and buoy. 5 Goatfish; 3 Surgeonfish; 1 Flyingfish (+ 2 faint); 1 Needlefish (near net); 1 Cornetfish; Squid, Jellyfish.
Watercolor painting, 21.25 x 14.75" (54 x 37.5 cm).
Fanciful watercolor painting, 6.75 x 8.25" ( 17 x 21 cm), 1927. "Sword"-fish and "Cutlass"-fish.
Fanciful watercolor painting, 6.75 x 8.25" ( 17 x 21 cm), 1927. "Sail"-fish.
Fanciful watercolor painting, 6.75 x 8.25" ( 17 x 21 cm), 1927. "Butterfly"-fish.
Fanciful watercolor painting, 6.75 x 8.25" ( 17 x 21 cm), 1927. "Angel"-fish.
Watercolor painting, 28 x 17.25" (71 x 43.5 cm), 1928. 8 Anglerfish; school of Flashlightfish?; 4 Catsharks (red); Krill (red).
Watercolor painting, 29? x 21" (74.5 x 53 cm), 1927. 1 Puffer; 5 Grunts; 1 Squirrelfish (orange); Great Blue Heron.
